sentences.sContent: Every morning, we see many old people doing morning exercises.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every morning, we see many old people doing morning exercises.
sentences.sCn: 每天早上我们看见许多老人在做早操。

sentences.sContent: If you keep doing morning exercises every day, you will be healthy by and by.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you keep doing morning exercises every day, you will be healthy by and by.
sentences.sCn: 如果你每天坚持做早操，你的身体不久以后就会健康起来。
